text: tamara para potana palanaharani krpa sodhavamam ko'i vandho nathi, jyare tame araphata thi pacha pharo to masa'are harama (eka pavitra jagyanum nama) pase allahana namanum smarana karo ane tenum smarana tevi rite karo jevi rite tene tamane margadarsana apyum, jo ke tame a pahela margathi bhataki gayela hata
